channel.title: Notes on Rusty Eddy
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Rusty Eddy

item.title: Webdev Guide
item.description: This section of my website is a collection of processes and best practices regarding software development. I gather them here, in an attempt to remember and formalize. Over the years, I have collected a set of practices and certain software practices and patterns. When I work for a client these practices will be documented as part of the development process. This section of my website is dedicated to the development of web sites and apps.
ZeroMQ Man I hope this software is as good as the opening of the ZGuide!
